body_html: It looks like the regular git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow.git command is now including the tensorflow/core folder again. Not sure if this was a caching issue on my end but all good now. Thanks!

body: It looks like the regular `git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow.git` command is now including the tensorflow/core folder again. Not sure if this was a caching issue on my end but all good now. Thanks!
